Name: Love Hentai and Puzzles: Yokai
About the game: A new hot jigsaw puzzle game to have some fun! Now with 10 beautiful illustrations, with inspiration from all yokai games, stories and the hot babes. When you start the puzzle the babes have clothes and when you finish it they lose their clothes and some unexpected thing can happen!
